text: he kitabavala'o! Ni:Sanka tamari pase amaro payagambara avi pahoncyo, je tamari samaksa allahani kitabani vadhum padati evi vato jahera kari rahyo che jene tame chupavi rahya hata ane ghani ja vatothi daragujara kare che, tamari pase allaha taraphathi prakasa ane khulli kitaba avi pahonci che
